assessments.status_rationale: The FOMC decision has not been announced yet; while one article previews a likely rate cut, no official outcome is reported.
No report of the Bank of England’s December decision is included in today’s news.
November existing-home sales data have not been released or cited in today’s coverage.
No Case-Shiller October 2025 YoY figure is reported in the provided news.
No NOAA SWPC G3 watch/warning/alert is mentioned; the window remains open.
There is no cited Weekly Petroleum Status Report showing crude production ≥13.4 mb/d.
No article references a WTI front-month settlement at or above $85.
No article references a Henry Hub front-month settlement at or below $2.25.
Coverage notes approval of some Nvidia chip sales to China, but there is no report of BIS adding a China AI chip firm to the Entity List.
Despite reporting on political involvement around Warner Bros., there is no disclosure of an HSR Second Request tied to a Paramount–WBD deal.
No operational statistics from Waymo are reported regarding weekly paid ride volume.
No new European Commission DMA non-compliance proceeding is mentioned.
The November 2025 CPI shelter figure has not been reported in the provided news.
